DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety Mitiglinide compare Nateglinide treatment type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Double-Blind Comparison Between Mitiglinide Nateglinide Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes patient inadequate control blood glucose diet and/or exercise therapy Type 1 diabetes patient Patients require treatment insulin Patients severe diabetic complication ( neuropathy , retinopathy nephropathy ) Patients severe ketosis , diabetic coma precoma Patients complicate severe hepatic disease Patients complicate severe renal disease Patients complicate severe hypertension Patients complicate severe cardiac disease Pregnant woman woman possible pregnant , nursing woman , woman want become pregnant study period
